diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Monogenic diabetes with mutations in KCNJ11, HNF1A, GATA6, and LMNA
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Type 1 diabetes, Type 2 diabetes, Other diabetes
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Four cases displayed genetic variants corresponding to monogenic diabetes genes. Clinical presentations and pancreatic histopathology suggested features overlapping with type 1 and type 2 diabetes. The use of genetic testing confirmed the diagnosis, distinguishing these cases from typical diabetes classifications.
